title: Update to Kite 0.17.1
description:
Kite 0.17.1 includes new features. Note that Kite 0.17 is a new major release with some API changes, but seem compile fine with Solr 4.10.3.
And some dependencies seem unnecessary [1] (poms files, generated, have dependencies redundant).
Regards


[1] net.sf.saxon:Saxon-HE, org.kitesdk:kite-morphlines-saxon

comments.author: Mark Miller
comments.content: +1 we should update to a recent release.

comments.author: Cassandra Targett
comments.content: I'm 90% sure this is a duplicate of SOLR-7805. Please reopen if I am mistaken.
